context_of_use: This use case allows customers and users to view and download reports for offline analysis.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: wants to analyze data offline
user: wants to analyze data offline
description: Allow customers and users to view and download reports for offline analysis.
triggering_event: User requests to view or download reports.
preconditions: User has permission to access reports.
assumptions: Users have access to the reporting feature.
Reports are available for viewing and downloading.
requirements_met: The system shall allow users to view reports.
The system shall allow users to download reports.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on report types available for download.
main_flow: 1. customer/user requests to view reports → System displays available reports.
2. customer/user selects a report to view → System shows the report details.
3. customer/user requests to download the report → System initiates the download process.
4. System confirms the download is complete.
alternative_flows: AF-1 (from Step 1): If no reports are available, System displays a message indicating no reports are found.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 3): If the download fails, System displays an error message and suggests retrying.
